    <section class="subsection subsection_white subsection_spacing">
     <div class="row row-smaller">
      <div class="large-6 columns">
       <div class="section_headline">
        <h2>
         Loving Compassionate
         <strong>
          Care
         </strong>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Children have a safe, secure, loving environment at Connie Maxwell. We are a home for some children who have been abandoned, abused, or neglected and others who have been placed by loving caregivers going through difficult situations. Each day offers a fresh opportunity to deliver hope and healing to those who are hurting. Get to know us and discover how you can become part of these life-changing stories.
       </p>
      </div>
      <div class="large-6 columns">
       <div class="video_container" id="video_container-1" style="background-image:url('https://www.conniemaxwell.com/images/uploads/page-images/largelovingcare-img.jpg');">
        <a class="video_btn video_btn-1" href="#">
         <img src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/assets/_img/video button_thumb.png"/>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="subsection_services subsection_spacing" data-image-src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/assets/_img/homepage_our-services.png" data-parallax="scroll" data-position="top center" data-speed=".4">
     <div class="row">
      <div class="section_headline section_headline-white text-center">
       <h2>
        Our
        <b>
         Services
        </b>
       </h2>
      </div>
      <div class="services_clouds">
       <div class="services_clouds-left">
        <img alt="Left Cloud" src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/assets/_img/homepage-services-left-cloud.png"/>
       </div>
       <div class="services_clouds-right">
        <img alt="right Cloud" src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/assets/_img/homepage-services-right-cloud.png"/>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="large-6 section_description-centered section_description-white">
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Each year, more than 200 children and their families participate in one of our core programs: residential care, family care, foster care, and crisis care.
       </p>
      </div>
      <div class="subsection_services-icons text-center">
       <div class="large-3 columns subsection_services-icons-item">
        <a href="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/what-we-do/care-detail/residential-care">
         <div class="subsection_services-icons-item-img">
          <img src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/images/uploads/page-images/residential-care-icon.png"/>
         </div>
        </a>
        <a href="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/what-we-do/care-detail/residential-care">
         Residential Care
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="large-3 columns subsection_services-icons-item">
        <a href="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/what-we-do/care-detail/family-care">
         <div class="subsection_services-icons-item-img">
          <img src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/images/uploads/page-images/foster-care-icon.png"/>
         </div>
        </a>
        <a href="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/what-we-do/care-detail/family-care">
         Family Care
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="large-3 columns subsection_services-icons-item">
        <a href="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/what-we-do/care-detail/foster-care">
         <div class="subsection_services-icons-item-img">
          <img src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/images/uploads/page-images/family-care-icon.png"/>
         </div>
        </a>
        <a href="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/what-we-do/care-detail/foster-care">
         Foster Care
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="large-3 columns subsection_services-icons-item">
        <a href="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/what-we-do/care-detail/crisis-care">
         <div class="subsection_services-icons-item-img">
          <img src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/images/uploads/page-images/crisis-care-icon.png"/>
         </div>
        </a>
        <a href="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/what-we-do/care-detail/crisis-care">
         Crisis Care
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="subsection subsection_white subsection_spacing">
     <div class="row">
      <div class="large-6 columns">
       <div class="subsection_tri-image-home">
        <div class="subsection_tri-image-home--large">
         <img src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/images/uploads/page-images/fpohowyouhelp2-square.jpg"/>
        </div>
        <div class="subsection_tri-image-home--medium">
         <img src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/images/uploads/page-images/fpohowyouhelp1-square.jpg"/>
        </div>
        <div class="subsection_tri-image-home--small">
         <img src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/images/uploads/page-images/fpohowyouhelp3-square.jpg"/>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="large-6 columns">
       <div class="section_headline">
        <h2>
         How You
         <strong>
          Can Help
         </strong>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <p>
        Ministering to children is a privilege that transforms the lives of all involved: the children, their families, our staff, donors, and volunteers. There are many¬†ways¬†you can support the children of Connie Maxwell¬†including prayer, volunteering, and financial support. Our work involves removing obstacles, providing solutions, and creating opportunities for a brighter future. And we need your help!
       </p>
       <div style="text-align: center;">
        <a class="button button-orange" href="/donate">
         DONATE
        </a>
        <a class="button button-orange" href="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/how-you-can-help/get-involved">
         GET INVOLVED
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="subsection_getconnected subsection_spacing" data-image-src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/assets/_img/homepage_get-connected.png" data-parallax="scroll" data-position="bottom center" data-speed=".4" style="padding-bottom: 0;">
     <div class="row" style="margin-bottom: 100px;padding-left:20px;padding-right:20px;">
      <div class="large-3 columns large-offset-2">
       <div class="section_headline section_headline-white text-center">
        <h2>
         From the
         <b>
          President
         </b>
        </h2>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="row">
       <div class="small-12 section_description-white columns small-centered large-uncentered">
        <p style="display:inline-block">
        </p>
        <p>
         <a href="https://vimeo.com/241193185">
          <img alt="Danny Nicholson, president" class="subsection_single-image" src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/images/uploads/page-images/DannyStory_play.jpg" style="margin: 0px 15px; width: 400px; height: 235px; float: right;"/>
         </a>
         Every calling has a story. Hear new President Danny Nicholson share the moment when he and his wife Debra met a little five-year-old child and knew their lives would be forever changed.
         <a href="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/featured-news/danny-nicholson-story/">
          Learn¬†more
         </a>
         about the calling that led them to Connie Maxwell.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="row">
      <div class="section_headline section_headline-white text-center">
       <h2>
        Get
        <b>
         Connected
        </b>
       </h2>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="row row-smaller getconnected-card-group">
      <div class="small-12 columns">
       <!-- FACEBOOK CARD-->
       <div class="large-3 medium-6 small-12 columns flip-container" ontouchstart="this.classList.toggle('hover');">
        <div class="getconnected-card flipper">
         <div class="back" style="height:100%;">
          <div class="getconnected-card__facebook-icon">
           <a href="https://www.facebook.com/ConnieMaxwellCH/">
            <img alt="Facebook" src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/assets/_img/footer-facebook-icon.png"/>
           </a>
          </div>
          <div class="getconnected-card__facebook-content">
           <p>
            <a href="https://www.facebook.com/ConnieMaxwellCH/photos/a.10152159134016286.1073741864.123572091285/10155382237571286/?type=3" target="_blank">
             Volunteer team from Hickory Grove Baptist Church arrived in Greenwood for their first mission trip experience. They are already working hard and with a great spirit.
            </a>
           </p>
           <div class="social-avatar">
            <a href="https://www.facebook.com/ConnieMaxwellCH/" target="_blank">

             Some of our younger children visited the EdVenture Children‚Äôs Museum this week! They learned about all kinds of fun things (and even kissed a camelüê™üòâ). Your donations and support allow us to continue to give the children and families in our care these wonderful opportunities. We are so grateful! #FortheDreamsofChildren

   <div class="reveal cm-modal" data-reveal="" id="campusModal-Greenwood">
    <div class="row cm-modal_title">
     <div class="medium-6 columns">
      <div class="subsection_single-image">
       <img src="https://www.conniemaxwell.com/images/uploads/page-images/largeadmissions-img_1.jpg"/>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="medium-6 columns">
      <h2>
       Greenwood
      </h2>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row cm-modal_content">
     <ul>
      <li>
       Clorox Bleach
      </li>
      <li>
       Paper Plates
      </li>
      <li>
       Laundry Detergent
      </li>
      <li>
       Duke's Mayonnaise
      </li>
      <li>
       Paper Towels
      </li>
      <li>
       Solid Color Shower Curtains
      </li>
      <li>
       Solid Color Bath Mats
      </li>
      <li>
       Shower Liners
      </li>
      <li>
       Small bottles of glue (4 oz)
      </li>
      <li>
       Marble Composition Notebooks (wide-rule)
      </li>
      <li>
       Large Pink Erasers
      </li>
      <li>
       Ear Buds
      </li>
      <li>
       1 1/2", 2" and 3" three ring binders
      </li>
      <li>
       Alcohol Free Hand Sanitizer
      </li>
      <li>
       Boxes of tissues
      </li>
      <li>
       Boys and Girls Backpacks
      </li>
      <li>
       Walmart gift cards
      </li>
     </ul>
    </div>

       Hand Soap
      </li>
      <li>
       Body Wash for Boys and Girls
      </li>
      <li>
       Zip-Lock Bags
      </li>
      <li>
       Sunscreen
      </li>
     </ul>
    </div>

     <span aria-hidden="true">

     </span>
    </button>
   </div>
